etomica.mappedvirial

Class PotentialCalculationMappedVirial

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.mappedvirial.PotentialCalculationMappedVirial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PotentialCalculation

    public class PotentialCalculationMappedVirial
extends java.lang.Object
implements PotentialCalculation
    PotentialCalculation that implements mapped-averaged virial (to get the pressure).
